data.text: @shivamsarin As mentioned earlier, there will not be any additional charges for re-issuance of boarding pass at the airport. However, for assistance with check-in or re-issuance of boarding pass through our Customer Helpline, a facilitation fee of INR 200 per passenger will be charged.

@shivamsarin Please note that the allocation of preferred seats is chargeable. In order to avoid any additional charges, passengers can always opt for the auto-assign option at the time of check-in during the seat assignment process.
@badassflowerbby Hey! Please note, lighters come in the category of dangerous goods hence are not allowed either in hand or check-in baggage.
@shivamsarin For more information, please refer to point 3 at https://t.co/7pLHRPDbe6. 2/2

entity.name: Fans celebrate Amitabh Bachchan’s birthday 🥳
entity.description: The following Tweets are part of a live conversation detected by an algorithm.

data.text:
To the Shahanshah of Indian cinema. To the legend who needs no introduction. Happy 80, @SrBachchan!

#FlySpiceJet #SpiceJet #AmitabhBachchan #BigB #Shahanshah https://t.co/yCeV1kuw0k
